Body:
df = MJOLNIR.Data.DataFile.DataFile('Data/camea2018n000136.hdf')
print(df.sample.projectionVector1, df.sample.projectionVector2)
assert np.all(np.isclose(df.sample.projectionVector1, np.array([1.0, 0.0, 
    0.0])))
assert np.all(np.isclose(df.sample.projectionVector2, np.array([0.0, 1.0, 
    0.0])))
df2 = MJOLNIR.Data.DataFile.DataFile('Data/camea2018n000178.hdf')
assert np.all(np.isclose(df2.sample.projectionVector1, np.array([0.0, 0.0, 
    1.0])))
assert np.all(np.isclose(df2.sample.projectionVector2, np.array([1.0, 1.0, 
    0.0])))
